entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 31 March 2023
